Package src.controller

Class Controller

Object
Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The Controller class is responsible for: - Processing the request from the client for each service
- Invoke the appropriate service
- Marshal service responses with the help of Marshaller
- Invoke Server method to send the response back to the client
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lee Juin

      Parameters:
